author: 1soxgrpui
content: I donâ€™t know if the channel for mentioning this is correct, but I have seen developers digging into Sepolia causing laptop CPUs to burn out due to high temperatures. I sympathize with this and think developers should help each other. Two years ago, I opened the Sepolia faucet and generated 100,000 transactions. Now I want to resume the business and update the scheme, I have to check the IP and defense mechanism at the beginning of the session because I found someone abusing it without any restrictions, causing my balance to be low and stopping someone from trying to abuse it again, I hope someone Willing to help me <@552133098075193354> thanks again for your generosity
